text: Angry Kid is a British adult live-action/stop-motion animated comedy web series about a redheaded teenager named Angry Kid, created by Darren Walsh. ==Synopsis== The show centers around teenage schoolboy Angry Kid (voiced by Darren Walsh) and his crazy adventures of being chased by dogs, making prank phone calls, and annoying his friends and family. ==References== ==Other websites== * Angry Kid home page * * Watch Angry Kid Series 1 & 2 Exclusively on AtomFilms * Angry Kid & the Flaming Choppers Handbags World Cup Single Category:British television series Category:Animated television series
title: Angry Kid
